/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The highway itself is divided into multiple lanes, with a median separating the directions of traffic. Cars can be seen moving along the lanes, their colors muted against the bright backdrop. On the right side of the road, there's a sidewalk lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the hustle and bustle of the city's transportation system.
